content:
I used two main database. One is Mysql,anther is Sqlserver.
Early, Mysql is the best choice for me. It’s handy and friendly. A financial personal database were builded by it. I downloaded data from CS/BS client and import it into Mysql.
Then I wrote many sql-language script to get many statements or reports quickly. It’s saving much of time for me.
Now,I use sqlserver to manage huge data because of Mysql support huge data poorly.
Sqlserver is amazing database. Whatever how many items ,it can handle.
END,I recomment the workbench,Sqlserver studio and dbeaver to manage date. Especially,the dbeaver is very helpful to import big txt or csv documents.
Normal search sql grammar: With temp as
Select/delete/update/insert into…
Top/Distinct
Sum/Count/average/max/min/round…
Case when xxx then xxx else xxx end as xxx
from database.table
Inner join/left join/right join/full join/self join
Where
And
And not
And exists
And not exists
Or
Like/between/in/not in/
Group by
Having
Order by
Union all /Union
Software download links: Mysql: Mysql software(https://www.mysql.com/downloads/)
Workbench for Mysql(https://www.mysql.com/products/workbench/) Sqlserver Sql server(https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/sql-server/sql-server-downloads)
Sql server studio(https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/sql/ssms/download-sql-server-management-studio-ssms?view=sql-server-ver16) For all Dbeaver (https://dbeaver.io/download/)
summary:
I used two main database. One is Mysql,anther is Sqlserver.
Early, Mysql is the best choice for me. It’s handy and friendly. A financial personal database were builded by it. I downloaded data from CS/BS client and import it into Mysql.
Then I wrote many sql-language script to get many statements or reports quickly. It’s saving much of time for me.
Now,I use sqlserver to manage huge data because of Mysql support huge data poorly.
title: The database I used

content:
R is a very famous programming language. R was designed by statisticians who want analysis to be easy.
We can use R to analyze data or formal digraph. I usually take some graph by R. As you know, many tasks are very similar in our work and we must do them again and again just because some data is changed. It will spend our much time and it’s very boring. But if you have R, you can do this easily. NEXT, I will share what I do with R.
There are two important things for analysis. One is data, another is analytic process.
Here are some analytical steps:
Build a database Make a script to download data and import to database Find a proposal and make a R script Run the R script at R-studio Upon steps are the basic method to get a digraph.
Besides that, you also need to get these knowledge. These are lists:
Database knowledge, it’ll help you to get data R packages knowledge, it’ll help you to form figure Finally, it’s better if you take some tips about RMD for html. The html documents which can be generated automatically could be published as websites.
links: R-example
summary:
R is a very famous programming language. R was designed by statisticians who want analysis to be easy.
We can use R to analyze data or formal digraph. I usually take some graph by R. As you know, many tasks are very similar in our work and we must do them again and again just because some data is changed. It will spend our much time and it’s very boring. But if you have R, you can do this easily.
title: What to do with R?
